## Fuzzy

**Extends Component**

The Fuzzy React component

**Parameters**

-   `props`  

### componentDidMount

Initiates the image loading when mounted

### componentWillReceiveProps

Handles new properties. Either loads a new image or applies new filters on the original image.

**Parameters**

-   `nextProps` **[object][29]** The new properties

### loadImage

Initiates the image loading

**Parameters**

-   `url` **[string][30]** The image url

### onImgLoaded

Callback for when the image is laoded. Gets the image data and begins processing.

### setImageDataFromOriginalImage

Draws the image to the canvas and gets the image data

### processImage

Processes the filters and applies them

**Parameters**

-   `filter` **[array][31]** The string filter or array of filters to apply
-   `parameter` **[string][30]** Any provided parameter (number or string)
-   `useImg` **[boolean][32]** Flag indicating if an img element is being used

### applyFilter

Applies the filter

**Parameters**

-   `filter` **[string][30]** The filter to apply
-   `parameter` **[string][30]** Filter parameter (string or number)

### render

React render function

## FuzzyLogic

The main logic class for image processing

### colorFilter

Applies a color filter

**Parameters**

-   `imageData` **[object][29]** The image data object (from canvas context)
-   `color` **[string][30]** The color filter to apply

### invert

Applies a invert filter with optional color

**Parameters**

-   `imageData` **[object][29]** The image data object (from canvas context)
-   `color` **[string][30]** The color filter to apply

### greyscale

Applies a greyscale filter

**Parameters**

-   `imageData` **[object][29]** The image data object (from canvas context)

### pixelate

Applies a pixelation effect

**Parameters**

-   `imageData` **[object][29]** The image data object (from canvas context)
-   `pixelSize` **[number][33]** The pixel size

### boxBlur

Applies a box blur effect

**Parameters**

-   `imageData` **[object][29]** The image data object (from canvas context)
-   `blurSize` **[number][33]** Strength of the blur

### horizontalBlur

Applies a horizontal blur effect

**Parameters**

-   `imageData` **[object][29]** The image data object (from canvas context)
-   `blur` **[number][33]** Strength of the blur

### verticalBlur

Applies a vertical blur effect

**Parameters**

-   `imageData` **[object][29]** The image data object (from canvas context)
-   `blur` **[number][33]** Strength of the blur

### gaussianBlur

Applies a gaussian blur effect

**Parameters**

-   `imageData` **[object][29]** The image data object (from canvas context)

### emboss

Applies an emboss effect

**Parameters**

-   `imageData` **[object][29]** The image data object (from canvas context)

### sharpen

Applies a sharpen effect

**Parameters**

-   `imageData` **[object][29]** The image data object (from canvas context)

### luminosity

Applies a luminosity effect

**Parameters**

-   `imageData` **[object][29]** The image data object (from canvas context)
-   `value` **[number][33]** The amount to lighten or darken

### edgetrace

Applies a edge tracing effect

**Parameters**

-   `imageData` **[object][29]** The image data object (from canvas context)

### convolution

Applies the provided convolution matrix and options

**Parameters**

-   `imageData` **[object][29]** The image data object (from canvas context)
-   `parameters` **[object][29]** Object containing convolution matrix, divisor, and offset

## Pixel

Very simple pixel class

**Parameters**

-   `red` **[number][33]** The red integer value
-   `green` **[number][33]** The green integer value
-   `blue` **[number][33]** The blue integer value
-   `alpha` **[number][33]** The alpha integer value

### R

Gets the red value

Returns **[number][33]** The red value

### G

Gets the green value

Returns **[number][33]** The green value

### B

Gets the blue value

Returns **[number][33]** The blue value

### A

Gets the alpha value

Returns **[number][33]** The alpha value
